title: Unable to save webpage to collections on Google Pixel 3 even though I am connected to the internet.
content: whenever I try to save a web page to my collections on Google Pixel 3, it tells me it could not be saved and to check the internet connection. However, the internet is connected. I use a Wi-Fi hotspot. and I am tethering. And he suggestions? It worked for almost a year until just a few weeks ago and then suddenly quit working.
